00062 typedef enum __orxSYSTEM_EVENT_t
00063 {
00064   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_CLOSE = 0,
00065   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED,
00066   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_FOCUS_LOST,
00067   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_MOUSE_IN,
00068   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_MOUSE_OUT,
00069 
00070   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_BACKGROUND,
00071   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_FOREGROUND,
00072 
00073   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START,
00074   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP,
00075 
00076   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_BEGIN,
00077   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_MOVE,
00078   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_END,
00079   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE,
00080   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_MOTION_SHAKE,
00081 
00082   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_NUMBER,
00083 
00084   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
00085 
00086 } orxSYSTEM_EVENT;

00090 typedef struct __orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD_t
00091 {
00092   orxU32 u32FrameCounter;
00093 
00094 #if defined(__orxIPHONE__) && defined(__orxOBJC__)
00095   union
00096   {
00097     /* UI event */
00098     struct
00099     {
00100       UIEvent *poUIEvent;
00101 
00102       union
00103       {
00104         /* Touch event */
00105         NSSet          *poTouchList;
00106 
00107         /* Motion event */
00108         UIEventSubtype  eMotion;
00109       };
00110     };
00111 
00112     /* Accelerate event */
00113     struct
00114     {
00115       UIAccelerometer *poAccelerometer;
00116       UIAcceleration  *poAcceleration;
00117     };
00118   };
00119 #elif defined(__orxANDROID__) || defined(__orxANDROID_NATIVE__)
00120   union
00121   {
00122 #ifdef __orxANDROID_NATIVE__
00123   /* UI event */
00124     struct
00125     {
00126       orxU32    u32ID;
00127       orxFLOAT  fX, fY, fPressure;
00128     } stTouch;
00129 #endif // __orxANDROID_NATIVE__
00130 
00131 #ifdef __orxANDROID__
00132   /* UI Touch event */
00133   struct
00134   {
00135     /* Array size */
00136     jint  uPointerCount;
00137     /* Contains pointer identifier if additionnal touch is available (it's the case for Android ACTION_POINTER_UP/DOWN event)   */
00138     /* (event == orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_BEGIN and uActionPointer != -1) means ACTION_POINTER_DOWN occurs             */
00139     /* (event == orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_END and uActionPointer != -1) means ACTION_POINTER_UP occurs               */
00140     jint  uActionPointer;
00141     /* Array containing pointer identifier */   
00142     jint  *puIdArray;
00143     /* Array containing X coord   */
00144     jfloat  *pfXArray;
00145     /* Array containing Y coord   */
00146     jfloat  *pfYArray;
00147     /* Array containing pressure  */
00148     jfloat  *pfPressureArray;
00149   } stTouch;
00150 #endif // __orxANDROID__
00151 
00152     /* Accelerate event */
00153     struct
00154     {
00155       void     *pAccelerometer;
00156       orxFLOAT  fX, fY, fZ;
00157     } stAccelerometer;
00158   };
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 } orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD;
